content: square n fair - margarethe a pattern designed by unikatissima square n fair - margarethe this document contains the pattern/diagram for the crochet square margarethe and provides several matching patterns/diagrams to this square elements additionally i have included several ideas on how to combine the different elements and project ideas about what to do with the elements because different terms are used for the same stitches in british and american english you can find descriptions of the used stitches in order to easily identify them please note that i have spent quite a long time to compile this document and be so kind as to observe the terms of use have fun content square n fair - margarethe 1 terms of use 2 patterns / diagrams 3 combinations 7 used stitches 8 symbols terms abbreviations 8 magic_ring 8 chain 8 single_crochet 9 half treble 9 treble 10 slip_stitch 10 treble_crochet 11 project ideas 12 use different materials 12 make different items 13 page 1 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe terms of use terms of use all content text pictures diagrams etc of this document is protected by copyright this document/file is for your use only you may - crochet items from my diagrams and - sell the finished items but not mass produce - print a copy of this file for your personal use only and - set a link to the blog entry to tell friends of this document - not share this file - no re sale of file or printed copies of this document - no distribution for free or loan nor digitally nor on paper - no publication in internet e g forums blogs etc or any other medium - not mass produce items with patterns based on my diagrams* - not claim the patterns as your own and - not distribute for free or loan your own designs based on my diagrams * what is mass production if you design an item based on my diagrams you may produce and sell up to 30 of those items e g up to 30 equal scarves with the same pattern based on my diagrams up to 30 tops with the same pattern based on my diagrams and so forth it would be great if you gave credit to unikatissima e g in the form of design of square by unikatissima design of top/afghan/scarf… by me - i really would appreciate this thank you if you have any questions about the terms of use please drop me an email unikatissima@gmx de page 2 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe patterns / diagrams patterns / diagrams the elements are designed to be connected while working not to be crocheted and sewn afterwards at the corners and the edges see also section combinations i changed colours from row to row to make the diagrams more readable used stitches please note that the terms of the
